
ADJ_yy = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL
      this = c:CAL
      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA
			exists = c:PEU
			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_yy

  text = {

			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_sovereign_archduchy_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes
					OR = {
						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes
					}
					count > 1
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_america_adj_yy
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:MOL
      this = c:MOL

ADJ_eeho = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_eeho
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name

ADJ_eemu = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_eemu
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_eemu
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_eemu
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_eemu
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_eemu

			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes

			exists = c:SPA

			scope:actor ?= {

					was_formed_from = PRG

						}
						has_diplomatic_pact = {
							who = scope:actor
							type = protectorate
							is_initiator = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_kazakh_steppe_governorate_general_adj_eemu
  }

ADJ_ee = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_ee
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_ee
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_ee
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_ee
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_ee
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL

      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_ee
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA

			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_ee

			scope:actor ?= {

					was_formed_from = PLT

			}
		}

    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_ee

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes

						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes

					count > 1
				}
			}
		}
    }

ADJ_em = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_em
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_em
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_em
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_em
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_em
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL
      this = c:CAL
      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_em
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA
			exists = c:PEU
			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_em
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:ONT

			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_sovereign_archduchy_adj_em

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_em
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes
					OR = {
						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes
					}
					count > 1
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_america_adj_em

  text = {

					scope:actor ?= {
						is_subject_of = c:HRE
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:GER
					scope:actor ?= {
						is_subject_of = c:GER
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = c:AUS
					scope:actor ?= {
						is_subject_of = c:AUS
					}
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_klein_venedig_adj_em

ADJ_eem = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_eem
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_eem
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_eem
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_eem
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_eem
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL
      this = c:CAL
      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_eem
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA
			exists = c:PEU
			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_eem

			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes

      exists = c:FND

					was_formed_from = PLT

		}

    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_eem

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes
					OR = {
						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes

				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_america_adj_eem

						is_subject_of = c:GER

					}
				}
			}
		}
    }

ADJ_yym = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL
      this = c:CAL
      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA
			exists = c:PEU
			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:ONT
      this = c:ONT
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:ONT
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_canada_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:USA
      this = c:USA
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_sovereign_archduchy_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes
					OR = {
						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes
					}
					count > 1
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_america_adj_yym
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:MOL

      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes

ADJ_aa = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL
      this = c:CAL
      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA
			exists = c:PEU
			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:ONT
      this = c:ONT
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:ONT
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_canada_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:USA
      this = c:USA
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_sovereign_archduchy_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes
					OR = {
						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes
					}
					count > 1
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_america_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:MOL
      this = c:MOL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_principalities_adj_aa

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:POR

			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes

				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SAO_PAULO
			}
			NOT = { exists = c:BRZ }

				NOT = {
					has_technology_researched = nationalism
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_baku_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:LUR
      this = c:LUR
      {
			exists = scope:actor
			scope:actor = {
				is_country_type = unrecognized
				NOT = {
					has_technology_researched = nationalism
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_bakhtiari_adj_aa
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					any_scope_state = {
						NOT = { has_state_trait = state_trait_andes }
						percent > 0.4
					}
					any_scope_state = {
						is_incorporated = yes
						OR = {
							state_is_in_north_america = yes
							state_is_in_central_america = yes
						}
						count > 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_american_federation_adj_aa
  }

ADJ_ou = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL
      this = c:CAL
      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA
			exists = c:PEU
			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:ONT
      this = c:ONT
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:ONT
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_canada_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:USA
      this = c:USA
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_sovereign_archduchy_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes
					OR = {
						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes
					}
					count > 1
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_america_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:MOL
      this = c:MOL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_principalities_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:POR
      this = c:POR
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
			scope:actor ?= {
				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_RIO_DE_JANEIRO
				owns_entire_state_region = STATE_SAO_PAULO
			}
			NOT = { exists = c:BRZ }
		}
    }

  text = {

      exists = c:RUS

				NOT = {
					has_technology_researched = nationalism
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_bakhtiari_adj_ou
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					any_scope_state = {
						NOT = { has_state_trait = state_trait_andes }
						percent > 0.4
					}
					any_scope_state = {
						is_incorporated = yes
						OR = {
							state_is_in_north_america = yes
							state_is_in_central_america = yes
						}
						count > 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_american_federation_adj_ou
  }

				}
			}
		}

ADJ_sti = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL
      this = c:CAL
      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA
			exists = c:PEU
			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:ONT
      this = c:ONT
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:ONT
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_canada_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:USA
      this = c:USA
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_sovereign_archduchy_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes
					OR = {
						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes
					}
					count > 1
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_america_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:MOL
      this = c:MOL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = yes
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_principalities_adj_sti

  text = {

      exists = c:POR

			}
			NOT = { exists = c:BRZ }

    }

					any_scope_state = {
						NOT = { has_state_trait = state_trait_andes }
						percent > 0.4
					}
					any_scope_state = {
						is_incorporated = yes
						OR = {
							state_is_in_north_america = yes
							state_is_in_central_america = yes
						}
						count > 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_american_federation_adj_sti
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:ALK
      this = c:ALK
      {
			scope:actor = {
				any_primary_culture = {
					cu:russian ?= this
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_alyaska_adj_sti
  }

ADJ_o = {
  type = country
  priority = 101
  log_loc_errors = no

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:rsm_revolt_name
      this = c:rsm_revolt_name
    }
    localization_key = rsm_revolt_name_adj_o
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:nihilist_germany_name
      this = c:nihilist_germany_name
    }
    localization_key = nihilist_germany_name_adj_o
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:AFS
      this = c:AFS
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				capital = { region = sr:region_zanj }
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_zambezi_free_state_adj_o
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:WAL
      this = c:WAL
      {
			coa_def_monarchy_flag_trigger = no
			scope:actor ?= {
				has_variable = ROM_united_principality
			}
			c:MOL ?= {
				is_subject_of = scope:actor
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_wallachia_and_moldavia_adj_o
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:TAS
      this = c:TAS
      {
			exists = c:GBR
			c:GBR = {
				has_diplomatic_pact = {
					who = c:TAS
					type = colony
					is_initiator = yes
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_van_diemans_land_adj_o
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:CAL
      this = c:CAL
      {
			coa_def_communist_flag_trigger = yes
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_ussr_californias_adj_o
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:BOL
      this = c:BOL
      {
			exists = c:SPA
			exists = c:PEU
			c:PEU = {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:SPA
			}
			scope:actor ?= {
				is_direct_subject_of = c:PEU
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_upper_peru_adj_o

  text = {

      exists = c:FND

			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT

					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_south_america_adj_o
  }

  text = {
    trigger = {
      exists = c:FND
      this = c:FND
      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					was_formed_from = PLT
					was_formed_from = ARG
					was_formed_from = URU
					was_formed_from = PRG
				}
				any_scope_state = {
					is_incorporated = yes
					OR = {
						state_is_in_north_america = yes
						state_is_in_central_america = yes
					}
					count > 1
				}
			}
		}
    }
    localization_key = dyn_c_united_provinces_of_america_adj_o

  text = {

      {
			scope:actor ?= {
				OR = {
					any_scope_state = {
						NOT = { has_state_trait = state_trait_andes }
						percent > 0.4
					}
					any_scope_state = {
						is_incorporated = yes
						OR = {
							state_is_in_north_america = yes
							state_is_in_central_america = yes
						}
						count > 1
					}
